headline: Cruise Planners Travel Franchise Launches Annual 2025 "CP World" Convention, Showcasing Marketing, Training & AI Enhancements
summary: Cruise Planners the nation's largest home-based travel franchise, is turning up the volume at its 2025 annual convention, CP World: Rock On. This year's theme honors travel advisors as industry rock stars while highlighting Cruise Planners' core pillars—Marketing, Technology, Training, Support, and Community—that fuel franchise success and innovation.
